project.projectName: GLIO-MAP: Longitudinal MRI and Survival Correlates in GBM
project.projectScope: Serial MRI neuro-imaging datasets for Glioblastoma patients paired with longitudinal survival data and clinical metadata.

summary.title: Longitudinal Glioblastoma Multiforme (GBM) MRI and Survival Cohort
summary.abstract: A retrospective longitudinal collection of multi-parametric MRI scans from 450 patients diagnosed with Glioblastoma Multiforme (WHO Grade IV). Linked with genomic biomarkers (IDH1, MGMT) and survival outcomes.

documentation.description: A retrospective longitudinal collection of multi-parametric MRI scans from 450 patients diagnosed with Glioblastoma Multiforme (WHO Grade IV). Linked with genomic biomarkers (IDH1, MGMT) and survival outcomes. This is a dummy description generated for testing purposes.
